scripts.db-reset: psql -U postgres -c "SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pg_stat_activity.pid) FROM pg_stat_activity WHERE pg_stat_activity.datname = 'testdb' AND pid <> pg_backend_pid();" && psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS testdb;" && psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE testdb;" && psql -U postgres -d testdb -f ./db/create_user.sql && psql -U app_user -d testdb -f ./db/init.sql
